attributes.action: Make NEAs count towards our A level grades
attributes.additional_details: Students have worked tirelessly hard on our coursework, for my subjects it is 20%. This needs to be counted.
attributes.background: Make NEAs (non-exam assessment) count towards our overall grade

rejection.details: Teachers have been allowed to use NEAs to inform the calculation of their students' Centre Assessment Grades, which will now form their GCSE and A-level results following the recent Government announcement: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/gcse-and-a-level-students-to-receive-centre-assessment-grades.
